title: Mirror Woods
blocka: Effect: While character at Mirror Woods, +1 die for all lore tests made by any player.

title: Gray River
blocka: Optional Test: Survival 2. Success: +1 Fortune. Failure: Weary.

title: Searching the Banks
blocka: Placement: Gray River
blockb: Optional Ongoing Test: Survival. Progress 6. Completion: Draw stage 1 mission cards.

title: Exposed Overlook
blocka: Effect: +1 die for all combat tests made at this location.

title: Scouting Ahead
blocka: Placement: Exposed Overlook
blockb: Optional Ongoing Test: Survival. Progress 3. Completion: Unlock Sightrock (Mission).

title: Musty Tomb
blocka: Optional Solo Test: Lore 2. Success: Draw stage 2 mission cards.

title: Scouting Ahead
blocka: Placement: Mirror Woods
blockb: Optional Ongoing Test: Survival. Progress 3. Completion: Unlock Gray Forest (Mission).

title: The Necromancer's Dark Heart
blocka: Placement: Musty Tomb
blockb: Optional Ongoing Test: Combat. Progress 6. Completion: Oniri joins party. MISSION COMPLETE.
blockd: Magic: Solo Test: Lore 2 or testing character is wounded.

title: Food Source
blocka: Action: +3 Food. Roll dice and add to pool.
blockb: Season End: +1 Food track. Burn card.

title: Timber Source
blocka: Action: +3 Timber. Roll dice and add to pool.
blockb: Season End: +1 Timber track. Burn card.

title: Timber Source
blocka: Action: +3 Timber. Roll dice and add to pool.
blockb: Season End: +1 Timber track. Burn card.

title: Ore Source
blocka: Action: +3 Ore. Roll dice and add to pool.
blockb: Season End: +1 Ore track. Burn card.

title: Mana Source
blocka: Action: +3 Mana. Roll dice and add to pool.
blockb: Season End: +1 Mana track. Burn card.

title: Poisonous Dusk Frogs
blocka: Solo Combat: 1. Success: +1 Combat. Burn card. Failure: Wounded.

title: Rocky Terrain
blocka: Survival: 2. Failure: All characters are weary.

title: Libram of Animation
blocka: Solo Lore: 1. Success: +1 Lore. Burn card. Failure: Weary.

title: Clearing the Woods
blocka: Placement: Mirror Woods

title: Animated Dead
blocka: Placement: Any Occupied Location
blockb: Optional Ongoing Test: Combat. Progress 4. Completion: Discard.
blockd: Uncommon: Move one location toward character with lowest lore.

title: Trackless Forest
blocka: Placement: Any wilderness location
blockb: Effect: While any character at attached location, may use timber resource dice as skill test dice.

title: Grueling Wilds
blocka: Placement: Character with lowest survival
blockb: Quick: Solo Test: Survival 2. Failure: Weary.
